2THESS 3.9 ni þatei ni habaidedeima waldufni, ak ei uns silbans du frisahtai gebeima izwis du galeikon unsis.
2THESS 3.10 jah auk þan wesum at izwis, þata izwis anabudum, ei jabai ƕas ni wili waurkjan, nih matjai.
2THESS 3.11 hausjam auk sumans ƕairbandans in izwis ungatassaba, ni waiht waurkjandans, ak fairweitjandans.
2THESS 3.12 þaimuh swaleikaim anabiudam jah bidjam in fraujin Iesua Xristau, ei miþ rimisa waurkjandans seinana hlaif matjaina.
2THESS 3.13 aþþan jus, broþrjus, ni wairþaiþ usgrudjans waila taujandans.
2THESS 3.14 iþ jabai ƕas ni ufhausjai waurda unsaramma þairh þos bokos, þana gatarhjaiþ;
ni blandaiþ izwis miþ imma, ei gaskamai sik.
2THESS 3.15 janni swaswe fijand ina rahnjaiþ, ak talzjaiþ swe broþar.
2THESS 3.16 aþþan silba frauja gawairþeis gibai izwis gawairþi sinteino in allaim stadim;
frauja miþ allaim izwis.
2THESS 3.17 so goleins meinai handau Pawlaus, þatei ist bandwo ana allaim aipistaulem meinaim;
swa melja.
2THESS 3.18 ansts fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus miþ allaim izwis.
amen.
2THESS Explicit.0 Du Þaissalauneikaium anþara ustauh.
1TIM Incipit.0 Du Teimauþaiau ·a· dustodeiþ.
1TIM 1.1 Pawlus apaustaulus Xristaus Iesuis bi anabusnim gudis nasjandis unsaris jah Xristaus Iesuis, wenais unsaraizos, 1TIM 1.2 Teimauþaiau, walisin barna in galaubeinai:
ansts, armaio, gawairþi fram guda attin jah Xristau Iesu fraujin unsaramma.

1TIM 1.3 swaswe baþ þuk saljan in Aifaison galeiþands Makedonais, ei faurbiudais sumaim ei anþarleiko ni laisjaina, 1TIM 1.4 niþþan atsaiƕaina spille jah gabaurþiwaurde andalausaize, þoei soknim andstaldand mais þau timreinai gudis þizai wisandein in galaubeinai.

1TIM 1.5 aþþan andeis ist anabusnais friaþwa us hrainjamma hairtin jah miþwissein godai jah galaubeinai unhindarweisai, 1TIM 1.6 af þaimei sumai afairzidai uswandidedun du lausawaurdein, 1TIM 1.7 wiljandans wisan witodalaisarjos, nih fraþjandans nih ƕa rodjand nih bi ƕa stiurjand.

1TIM 1.8 aþþan witum þatei goþ ist witoþ, jabai ƕas is witoda brukeiþ, 1TIM 1.9 witands þatei garaihtamma nist witoþ satiþ, ak witodalausaim jah untalaim jah unsibjaim jah frawaurhtaim jah unairknaim jah usweihaim, attans bliggwandam jah aiþeins... 1TIM 1.10 horam, mannans gaþiwandam, liugnjam, ufarswaram, jah jabai ƕa aljis þizai hailon laiseinai andstandiþ, 1TIM 1.11 sei ist bi aiwaggeli wulþaus þis audagins gudis þatei gatrauaiþ ist mis.
1TIM 1.12 jah awiliudo þamma inswinþjandin mik Xristau Iesu fraujin unsaramma, unte triggwana mik rahnida, gasatjands in andbahtja, 1TIM 1.13 ikei faura was wajamerjands jah wraks jah ufbrikands,
akei gaarmaiþs was, unte unwitands gatawida in ungalaubeinai.
1TIM 1.14 iþ ufarassiþ warþ ansts fraujins miþ galaubeinai jah friaþwai þizai in Xristau Iesu.
1TIM 1.15 triggw þata waurd jah allaizos andanumtais wairþ, þatei Xristus Iesus qam in þamma fairƕau frawaurhtans nasjan, þizeei frumists im ik.
1TIM 1.16 akei duþþe gaarmaiþs warþ, ei in mis frumistamma ataugidedi Xristaus Iesus alla usbeisnein du frisahtai þaim ize anawairþai wesun du galaubjan imma du libainai aiweinon.
1TIM 1.17 aþþan þiudana aiwe, unriurjamma, ungasaiƕanamma, ainamma, frodamma guda sweriþa jah wulþus in aldins aiwe.
amen.

...1TIM 1.18 faura faursniwandam ana þuk praufetjam, ei driugais in þaim þata godo drauhtiwitoþ, 1TIM 1.19 habands galaubein jah goda miþwissein, þizaiei sumai afskiubandans bi galaubein naqadai waurþun, 1TIM 1.20 þizeei ist Hwmainaius jah Alaiksandrus, þanzei anafalh Satanin, ei gatalzjaindau ni wajamerjan.
1TIM 2.1 Bidja nu frumist allis taujan bidos, aihtronins, liteinins, awiliuda fram allaim mannam,
